name: Egg Tapper
description:
Help an egg finds the mother. Tap the egg and avoid the tree branches until reaches the sky.

--------------------

I create this game using Game Maker: Studio for 2 weeks. You can play the game free, and download the game free on Windows, and Android.

To get better experience, I recommend to for you to play on Android and Windows, rather than Web (HTML5). Here is the list of differences across device versions:

Android:

  • Smooth graphic: the parallax on the back is rendered for each 1 sub-pixel (1 pixel can be consist of 3-4 sub-pixels).
  • Advertisement: support me financially :D

Windows:

  • Also smooth graphic: same explanation like Android version
  • No Advertisement: you can still support me by commenting, giving 5 stars (in itch.io and google play), and sharing. :D

Web (HTML5)

  • Not smooth graphic; the parallax on background is rendered for each 3-4 sub-pixels (1 pixel can be consist of 3-4 sub-pixels)
  • Some laggy assets (music and sound) for first load
  • No advertisement: still, you can support me by commenting, giving 5 stars (in itch.io and google play), and sharing. :D

So, please comments what you think about this game... :D
